file.name: sample-api-ref-completion.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.0
paths:
  "/users":
    summary: path item summary
    description: path item description
    get:
      operationId: getUserList
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A JSON array of user names
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": 
        '201':
          description: A response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/User"
components:
  schemas:
    User:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        name:
          type: string
        profile:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/UserProfile"
          summary: user profile reference summary
          description: user profile reference description
        profileExternalRef:
          "$ref": "http://example.com/test.yaml#/components/schemas/UserProfile"
    UserProfile:
      type: object
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
          x-nullable: true

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "User": parse schema: property "profileExternalRef": at 1:267: parse schema: resolve "http://example.com/test.yaml#/components/schemas/UserProfile": external "http://example.com/test.yaml": get: http: do: Get "http://example.com/test.yaml": host "example.com" is not allowed
